sentences.cn: …一部充满恐怖暴力但却引人入胜的电影。

sentences.en: Factual and forensic evidence makes a suicide verdict the most compelling answer to the mystery of his death.
sentences.cn: 事实证据和法庭证据使得自杀成为解开他死因之谜的最令人信服的答案。

sentences.en: Her eyes were her best feature, wide-set and compelling.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛是她五官中长得最好的，大而迷人。

sentences.en: Her latest book makes compelling reading.
sentences.cn: 她新出的书读起来扣人心弦。

sentences.en: Her latest book makes compelling reading.
sentences.cn: 她新出的书读起来扣人心弦。
他的眼睛有一种奇特的吸引力.

sentences.en: His life makes a compelling story .
sentences.cn: 他的一生是个引人入胜的故事。

sentences.en: His prose is always lucid and compelling.
sentences.cn: 他的散文素来简洁、有力。

sentences.en: I do not believe the reasons you have given are sufficiently compelling.
sentences.cn: 我不认为你提出的理由具有足够的强制性.

sentences.en: Instantly there flamed up in his body the all compelling desire.
sentences.cn: 立刻他的体内燃起了一股无法抗拒的欲火.

sentences.en: Lucy had no compelling reason to go into town.
sentences.cn: 露西没有充分的理由去镇上。

sentences.en: She found his story so compelling that she had forgotten to drink wine.
sentences.cn: 他的故事使她听得入神,以至她忘记喝酒了.

sentences.en: She is compelling, spectral, fascinating, an unforgettably unique performer.
sentences.cn: 她极具吸引力，清幽如鬼魅，令人着迷，令人难忘，是个独具特色的演员。

sentences.en: The case for greater nationalization is compelling.
sentences.cn: 主张进一步国有化的理由是令人信服的.

sentences.en: The court was presented with compelling evidence that she’d murdered her husband.
sentences.cn: 有人向法庭出示了令人信服的证据，证明她谋杀了丈夫。

sentences.en: The evidence was so compelling that he felt constrained to accept it.
sentences.cn: 证据是那样的令人折服，他觉得不得不接受。

sentences.en: There is a compelling logic to his main theory.
sentences.cn: 他的主要理论蕴含令人信服的逻辑推理.

sentences.en: There was a compelling logic to what Laura Bo was saying.
sentences.cn: 劳拉?波说的话里有无可辩驳的逻辑.

sentences.en: They will be the most compelling and seductive element in the style.
sentences.cn: 它们是文风中最令人心悦诚服,最富有魅力的东西.

words.tran_cn: 引人注目的；强制的；激发兴趣的
强迫；以强力获得（compel的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 令人信服的，引人入胜的，非常强烈的
trans.tran_en: very interesting or exciting, so that you have to pay attention

trans.tran_cn: 强迫，迫使（ compel的现在分词）
